website_summaries.verdict: A  gingerbread house kit with all the supplies for decorating you need to make a pretty house.
pros: Comes with a set-up tray and all the pre-baked cookie pieces you need to make your gingerbread creation
Also includes Wonka candy pieces, icing, and decorator bag
The resulting house is a good size and easy to assemble
cons: Some complaints of pieces arriving broken or box looking old.. We suggest buying extra icing to hold pieces in place

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase on Amazon ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these to do my annual Gingerbread decorating contest with my four grandkids...well, I pick them all up yesterday, December 21st (Saturday) we go out to eat and then back to the house to do some decorating—ONLY TO FIND THAT ALL FOUR HAD MULTIPLE CRACKED PANELS!!! We tried to put them together with the frosting provided, but to no avail. I had to run to the closest Walmart to purchase FOUR MORE GINGERBREAD HOUSE KITS! I had to give them one star in order to post this, but they don’t deserve one star!!! I want my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Norka Carrasquillo

customer_reviews.title: Only comes with .26 pounds of candy! Not a 1/2 pound like they advertise!! Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy! Make your own by scratch. Definitely a rip off considering I didn’t receive the “1/2” pound of candy that is advertised with this kit. Considering that’s technically what you’re paying for. Decided to weigh the measly 4 mini bags and it came to .26 total in their wrapped packages! Big let down. Was worried I would receive the kit with broken gingerbread (as most previous reviews claimed) But luckily to my surprise they were all intact (That is the only reason this gets 2 stars)
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't suggest for small children.
customer_reviews.text: The sides are hard to put together. I feel like I got shorted on candy, especially since I received no bananas in the Runts package and it was mostly the purple/plum/grape candy. If the candy isn't flat, it's hard to get it to stick to the house without falling out. At least the Icing was decent. I feel like this was a great idea, but then you out it together and it's not.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla A W

customer_reviews.title: better value at Aldi at Christmas time
customer_reviews.text: The pieces were broken and the tray to set things up was so small...better value at Aldi at Christmas time.
customer_reviews.author: jessica krchmar

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Cute
customer_reviews.text: It came In perfect shape. I added extra icing. Grandson loved!
customer_reviews.author: haywoman

customer_reviews.title: ... the pieces broken and it didn’t come with any sweet tarts sadvery
customer_reviews.text: This is how this arrived at my house gingerbread box was damaged no instructions the pieces broken and it didn’t come with any sweet tarts sadvery sad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not great
customer_reviews.text: This was okay. The candy was great but the icing didnt adhere the walls and roof well so unfortunately it fell apart frequently. If the icing was improved this would be pretty good. If you buy, I recommend having a back-up for icing.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Expired
customer_reviews.text: Didn't check it when it arrived, but went to use it today and discovered it expired almost a year ago. I suppose it only matters if you're going to eat it, but... Also, contrary to some reviews I've seen, it is NOT safe for peanut allergies. It has a "may contain" warning.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lindner

customer_reviews.title: Wonka gingerbread house kit
customer_reviews.text: Arrived just before Christmas - The pieces were so badly broken, we could only put together a "shed" with foundation problems, i.e., cracked walls, etc. Unless you're out in the boondocks and can't get a kit any other way but mail delivery, just buy one at groceries or Target/Walmart store next year!
customer_reviews.author: CET

customer_reviews.title: what a great kit
customer_reviews.text: Kit was delivered quickly, no broken pieces and plenty of icing and candy. But, the BEST thing is that the walls and roof were made interlocking like a log cabin. They baked the gingerbread pieces with the interlocking knobs on each piece. No trying to hold walls and roof to get it to stick together. The person working at Wonka who thought of this is a genius and deserves a raise. I will be getting these from now on.
customer_reviews.author: must

customer_reviews.title: Needs MORE icing!
customer_reviews.text: Not enough icing. We bought this last year and this year. Last year, there wasn't enough icing to do the entire house. This year we tried to use it more sparingly and there still wasn't enough icing. :( We have 1/2 a gingerbread house decorated and 1/2 empty!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Frosting sucks, but otherwise okay.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, but one piece of advice.... make or buy your own frosting. The frosting that comes is so hard like cement, and they don't give you enough. I had to make more with powdered sugar and milk. It came with more than enough candies, and the gingerbread wasn't broken even though it was the last one in the store and the box was somewhat molested. I got this at a discount store for $10; don't pay more than that.
customer_reviews.author: B. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Not complete kit
customer_reviews.text: It was a fun lot, but we only got two of the four types of candy that were supposed to be in the bag. We had to supplement with our own candy. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: S. New

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great set! The sides connect well and the Candy is great. The actual gingerbread does not taste great though
customer_reviews.author: CK

product_meta.title: Wonka Gingerbread Cottage Kit
feature_bullets: Kit Includes: Gingerbread, 1/2 lb of Candy, Premixed Vanilla Icing, Set-up Tray, Decorator Bag
Lots of fun for kids and adults both
Candy mix includes Runts, Nerds, Sweet Tarts and Bottlecaps
